abstract: Metro Transit passenger counts for 2010, 2011, 2012 and 2013.
The amount of road salt used for the years 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and the amount budgeted for.
Copy of HRM's Social Media policy.
All general ledger/account details from 2009-2014 pertaining to project/capital account #CQ300743 - Bayers Lake Infill and Ragged Lake Developments.
RFP #09-137 - Animal Services - Shelter Services. A copy of the winning proposal.
Detailed line item breakdown of savings as referenced on Page 23 of the Fire Services Operational Review - 2014 Update as presented to HRM Executive Council on December 15, 2014.
Copies of Memorandum of Understanding and/or Mutual Aid Agreement between HRM and Enfield, Hubbards, Mount Uniacke or any other fire departments or municipalities relating to fire protection.
A copy of the data in HRM's database of animals licenced under the A-300 bylaw including fields for the name of the pet, breed information, date licenced, type of licence and expiry date.
A copy of the data in the database of parking tickets issued in HRM from 2009 to 2014 inclusive.
The number of workplace harassment complaints per business unit for 2010, 2011, 2012.
Copy of climate survey responses as related to the operational review survey conducted by HRM Fire Services.
Agreement relating to IBM support services.
Information in relation to vandalism of HRM property.
Information in relation to HRP vehicle repairs.
Information in relation to graffiti costs.
Location information in relation to graffiti repairs/clean-up.
Information in relation to graffiti removal kits.
Information in relation to graffiti removal kits.
Number of cases of arson from Jan 01/06 to present. Also from Jan 01/13 to present, the type of building.
Number and type of prohibited animals still in the HRM and permitted under grandfathered regulations.
Number of violations to the curbside solid waste regulations from January 2011 to March 2014.
Records in relation to purchase/sale of Shannon Park.
Numbers and types of animals taken by Animal Services between Jan 01/10 and Mar 31/14. Also reason for confiscation.

Information regarding complaints made to the City that caused Animal Services to launch an investigation between the dates of Jan 01/13 and April 11/14. Also the total number of complaints for 2010, 2011,     2012 and 2013.
Density lot calculation for "The Craigmore" located at 1 Craigmore Dr., Halifax, NS.
Amount of overtime worked by Halifax Regional Fire & Emergency Services operational officers and the reason why the overtime was needed.
Records in relation to the "Bank of Canada" building on Hollis St., Halifax, NS.
A list of all 311 complaints over the last year by address or neighbourhood.
Information in relation to Capital Reserve Fund Q107 - fund balance, contributions,  capital/operating/other budget withdrawals for fiscal 2013/2014.
Records in relation to the Roy Building, 1657 Barrington St, Halifax, NS.
A listing of all unclaimed cheques (except those issued to individuals) issued by HRM from January 01/13 to December 31/14 and everything unclaimed in 2014 as of July 01/14.
Information in relation to Capital Reserve Fund Q107 - balances, contributions, interest earned, capital/operating/other budget withdrawals from 2006 through to fiscal 2013/2014.
Records in relation to streets markings and parking control signs for Hollis St., Lower and Upper Water Street, Halifax.
Information in relation to Deed Transfer Tax revenue and Building Permit revenue.
Water quality data (upstream and downstream) along Nine Mile River, adjacent to Otter Lake Landfill.
Water sample results for all HRM beaches from May to September, 2003 to present.
Information relating to parking ticket data from 2009 to 2013.
Records in relation a diesel fuel leak on Halifax (Metro) Transit property.
Information on diesel fuel leak on Halifax (Metro) Transit's Burnside Facility.
Various records/correspondence in relation to Purcell's Cove, water & sewer, RP+5 from November 20/13 to May 22/14.

Staff report pertaining to capital withdrawals from the Parkland Capital Fund, information relating to heritage building upgrades and contributor information in relation to specific Parkland Fee (Q107) items.
Database information in relation to specific types of calls (re: Taxi licensing, Vending, Minimum Standards, Land Use, Illegal Dumping, Animal) placed to HRM.
Details of unusual transactions in Ontario on a commercial fuel card, identified in HRM's Auditor General report of May 2014.
Information in relation to deck/balcony inspections in HRM.
Records in relation to the number of sick days claimed by employees in each HRM Business Unit for 2012.
Records in relation to the number of sick days claimed by employees to date in each HRM Business Unit for 2014.
Results of Hazardous Materials study by Stantec Consulting Ltd taken in February 2014 on 1588 Barrington St., Halifax.
Information relating to parking ticket data from January 2010 to date.
The total value of library fines collected and issued in 2013 and 2014 to date by Library branch including a breakdown of the types of fines issued.
All passenger complaints to Metro Transit during 2013.
All passenger complaints to Metro Transit during 2014 up to September 16, 2014.
All passenger complaints to Metro Transit during 2012.
An electronic file on all orders to comply issued under the M100 bylaw from January 2014 to date.
An electronic file on all orders to comply issued under the M100 bylaw from January 1, 2013 to January 1, 2014.
All outstanding debts to the Municipality that have been turned over to third party debt collectors in the last five years and the names of those third party agencies.
Monthly breakdown of overtime for operational firefighters and officers from January 1, 2013 to December 15, 2014.

All communications (reports, lessons learned, briefs, memos, emails etc.) between City staff and Halifax Water relating to Lake Major Dam evacuation order and associated repairs (December 10, 2014 - January 19, 2015).
Documentation and correspondence that Halifax used to successfully secure federal grant for its new library.
Infractions to Bylaw M100 including open cases by both the City and Fire Services, details should include but are not limited to dates, names, locations, specific infractions.
HRM winning proposal for RFP 14-032R Water Quality Monitoring (awarded November 14, 2014 to SLR Consulting).
All general ledgers/ account details from 2009 - 2014 pertaining to project/capital account number CQ300748- Washmill Lake Court/102 Underpass.
Halifax Transit drivers overtime for 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014. The amount of all over time paid out by Halifax Transit and a breakdown by division.

Any document(s) related to the estimated total amount owed to Halifax by the Federal Department of Public Works via PILT (Payments in Lieu of Taxes) for ownership of the 40+ acres known as Citadel Hill.
The number of bus (Halifax Transit) collisions there have been since March 31, 2013, along with location, date/time and reasoning for accident.
All documents: memos, emails, reports, minutes of meetings and speeches relating to the 2010 Africville Apology.
All parking violations in HRM from 2010 to 2014 including the following: location of violation, anonymized agent identifier and time/date of violation.
Records in relation to snow clearing operations in the HRM from January 1, 2015 to March 19, 2015.
The number of hours and dollar value of overtime claimed by each HRM employee in 2014.
All correspondence to the Mayor on the subject of bicycling infrastructure (including painted bike lanes) in HRM - from January 2015 to June 2015.
Data in relation to animal registration and licensing from April 1, 2014 to March 31, 2015.
Data in relation to parking ticket information from April 1, 2014 to March 31, 2015.

An electronic file of the names, salary ranges and classification of  HRM employees with a dedicated media relations and/or communications function, the total pay and benefits costs for 2012, 2013 and 2014.
A copy of HRM's internal policy for employee use of social media.
Phase 1 external review of HR Services report prepared for HRM, in  accordance with Request for Proposal P13-321.
All correspondence between the Mayor and the Province in 2014 on the subject of provincial funding for municipal programs.

Detailed expense records from all Councillors on council expenses for the fiscal year of April 1, 2014 to March 31, 2015. Should include any item such as hospitality (entertainment, food, etc.), travel, transportation and other reimbursed costs.

Information in relation to Councillor's Support Office advertising and promotion budget . An excel spreadsheet detailing how each  councillor and the manager spent this budget  
for the 2014/2015 fiscal year.
Access to an electronic file of all freedom of information requests received since January 2, 2012, including requests that remain uncompleted.

Records in relation to the Urban Reserve Designation for 1162 Main St. and west, up to and including the NS Home for Coloured Children. All information as to when urban designation was assigned, from 2010 to present.
All current contracts between the City and a third party for the operation/management of city owned/leased parking facilities.
Copies of the original contracts between HRM and Scotiabank, BMO, Emera & Molson Coors for various branding rights to municipal properties.
An electronic database of data regarding damage to private and public property caused by snow-clearing equipment from November 1, 2014 to June 30, 2015.
Complaints regarding cabs, cab drivers and cab companies in Halifax from July 10, 2012 to July 10, 2015.
All fire investigation summaries prepared by Halifax Regional Fire Services that were at a rooming house between the years 1995-2015.
A list of any Twitter accounts muted and any accounts blocked for each of the Twitter accounts operated by HRM municipal personnel.

A complete list of all streets and roads in District 15, including total street length, current surface condition (good, fair, poor) and winter priority status for the years 2015, 2010, 2005 and 2000.
